reviewText: What a nice game! I love it how its a combo of relaxing and using your brain. :)  Graphics and sounds are pleasant. Totally recommend it!
voteText: 7 of 10 people (70%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText: Fun little puzzle game. Easy to get into but with a lot of depth. Can't recommend at full price but under a couple bucks or in a bundle like I got it it's definitely a winner.

https://youtu.be/QV7SUiwcfvw

Just some basic math, how hard could it be to keep a running total in your head?  Turns out it's pretty tricky and even better it makes a satisfying puzzle game.

The difficulty starts out slow but quickly ramps up to include multiplication, division and exponentials.  The tutorial only explains the details of the scoring mechanic after whiffing c couple three star results but it's easy to go back and clean up.

In the end, Sumico adds up to be a fun and challenging game.
